Package com.aldodaquino.cobra.test

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aldodaquino.cobra.test.Main
  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Prepares an environment for tests: - deploys a CatalogContract; - starts an author-server on the default port 8080; - deploy some contents; - start two instances of the GUI, one for the Customer and one for the Author. You have to login with the rights private key on the GUIs.
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Aldo D'Aquino.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starts the tests.
        Parameters:
        args - a String[], optionally containing 2 options: -p --private-key Catalog owner private key. -a --author Author's private key. If args is null or an option is missing the default option will be used.
